Uses of Class
edu.pdx.cs410J.family.Person

  • Packages that use Person 
    Package Description
    edu.pdx.cs410J.family
    The package contains a family tree application that uses many of the classes that we discuss in CS410J.

    • Uses of Person in edu.pdx.cs410J.family

      Methods in edu.pdx.cs410J.family that return Person 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Person Person.getFather()
      Returns this person's father.
      Person Marriage.getHusband()
      Returns the husband in this marriage.
      Person Person.getMother()
      Returns this person's mother.
      Person AddPersonDialog.getPerson()
      Returns the Person created by this AddPersonDialog.
      Person ChoosePersonDialog.getPerson()
      Returns the choosen person
      Person EditPersonDialog.getPerson()
      Returns the Person created by this EditPersonDialog.
      Person FamilyTree.getPerson​(int id)
      Returns a person in this family tree with a given id.
      Person FamilyTreeList.getSelectedPerson()
      Returns the currently selected person.
      Person Marriage.getWife()
      Returns the wife in this marriage.
      Person PersonPanel.showFather()
      Displays and returns the current person's father
      Person PersonPanel.showMother()
      Displays the current person's mother
      Methods in edu.pdx.cs410J.family that return types with arguments of type Person 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Collection<Person> FamilyTree.getPeople()
      Returns a collection of Persons that are in this family tree.
      Methods in edu.pdx.cs410J.family with parameters of type Person 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void FamilyTree.addPerson​(Person person)
      Adds a person to this family tree.
      void Person.setFather​(Person father)
      Sets this person's father.
      void Person.setMother​(Person mother)
      Sets this person's mother.
      void FamilyTreeList.setSelectedPerson​(Person person)
      Sets the selected person.
      void PersonPanel.showPerson​(Person person)
      Displays information about a Person in this PersonPanel.
      Constructors in edu.pdx.cs410J.family with parameters of type Person 
      Constructor Description
      EditMarriageDialog​(Person spouse, JFrame owner, FamilyTree tree)
      Creates a new EditMarriageDialog for creating a new marriage involving one person.
      EditPersonDialog​(Person person, JFrame owner, FamilyTree tree)
      Creates a new EditPersonDialog for editing an existing Person.
      Marriage​(Person husband, Person wife)
      Creates a marriage between a husband and a wife.
